text: is a after Heisei. It is the current Japanese era. It is also called the Reiwa era. This era started on 1 May 2019. This is the day Japanese' Emperor Akihito's elder son, Naruhito, became Emperor of Japan. Naruhito is Japan's 126th Emperor. == Politics == * 2019 (Reiwa 1) * 2020 (Reiwa 2) * 2021 (Reiwa 3) * 2022 (Reiwa 4) * 2023 (Reiwa 5) * 2024 (Reiwa 6) * 2025 (Reiwa 7) == References == Category:Japanese eras Category:2010s establishments in Japan Category:2019 establishments in Asia
title: Reiwa period
